BoolProperty.Name: WebView2UseWinRT
BoolProperty.Description: Enables the WebView2 WinRT APIs for this project

BoolProperty.Name: WebView2EnableCsWinRTProjection
BoolProperty.Description: Enables the WebView2 C#/WinRT NET6.0 projection

EnumProperty.Name: WebView2LoaderPreference
EnumProperty.Description: Switch between using a static library or a DLL for the WebView2Loader

EnumValue.Name: Dynamic
EnumValue.Description: Sets the project to use a DLL for the WebView2Loader

EnumValue.Name: Static
EnumValue.Description: Sets the project to use a static library for the WebView2Loader

BoolProperty.Name: WebView2UseDispatchAdapter
BoolProperty.Description: Uses the wv2winrt tool that allows you to use WinRT objects with CoreWebView2.AddHostObjectToScript.

StringProperty.Name: WebView2DispatchAdapterOutputDir
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the directory where source files generated by wv2winrt will be saved.

StringProperty.Name: WebView2DispatchAdapterNamespace
StringProperty.Description: Namespace where types generated by wv2winrt will be placed.

BoolProperty.Name: WebView2DispatchAdapterUseJavaScriptCase
BoolProperty.Description: Enables JavaScript casing in wv2winrt generated types

EnumProperty.Name: WV2WinRTVerbosity
EnumProperty.Description: Sets the importance of wv2winrt build messages

EnumValue.Name: low
EnumValue.Description: Enables messages when MSBuild verbosity is set to at least 'detailed'

EnumValue.Name: normal
EnumValue.Description: Enables messages when MSBuild verbosity is set to at least 'normal'

EnumValue.Name: high
EnumValue.Description: Enables messages when MSBuild verbosity is set to at least 'minimal'

BoolProperty.Name: WV2WinRTExplicitIncludesOnly
BoolProperty.Description: Instead of implicitly including types referenced by included types, only types explicitly listed in an include will be included by wv2winrt.

BoolProperty.Name: WV2WinRTRequireAllowForWebAttribute
BoolProperty.Description: Only types with the 'AllowForWeb' attribute will be included by wv2winrt.

BoolProperty.Name: WV2WinRTIgnoreWebHostHiddenAttribute
BoolProperty.Description: Instead of excluding types with the 'WebHostHidden' attribute, ignore the attribute when deciding to include or exclude types.

BoolProperty.Name: WV2WinRTDisallowEmptyAdapter
BoolProperty.Description: Enables build error when there are no winmd reference inputs to wv2winrt

BoolProperty.Name: WV2WinRTWrapWebViewTypes
BoolProperty.Description: Includes WebView2 types in the types generated by wv2winrt

BoolProperty.Name: WebView2WinRTWrapSystemTypes
BoolProperty.Description: Includes WinRT types from the Windows SDK in the types generated by wv2winrt

EnumProperty.Name: WV2WinRTPlatformReferencesLevel
EnumProperty.Description: Sets the level of platform references to take as input to wv2winrt. Changes to this property have the most impact for Desktop projects, where the default of matching C++/WinRT can have a dramatic impact on binary size. Setting this property to a value different to the default one may require manually adding references to WebView2WinRTAdditionalWinMDReferences.

EnumValue.Name: explicit
EnumValue.Description: Resolves to platform references already resolved by the project. Behavior may vary depending on the project's target platform (UAP/Desktop).

EnumValue.Name: foundation
EnumValue.Description: Resolves to explicit references + Foundation contracts from the SDK referenced by this project.

EnumValue.Name: match
EnumValue.Description: Resolves to the references set by C++/WinRT.

StringListProperty.Name: WebView2WinRTAdditionalWinMDReferences
StringListProperty.Description: List of paths to additional WinMD files to provide to wv2winrt

StringListProperty.Name: WebView2DispatchAdapterIncludeFilters
StringListProperty.Description: List of namespaces or runtimeclass full names used to match types to include from referenced WinMD files

StringListProperty.Name: WebView2DispatchAdapterExcludeFilters
StringListProperty.Description: List of namespaces or runtimeclass full names used to match types to exclude from referenced WinMD files
